name: Ambient DM DLC - (Music) Dark Heroes
detailed_description:
Many parties will encounter a brooding NPC who may take them on a bit of a high strung adventure. Be prepared for such an event with this full album release! Intense, Exciting and Dramatic are some great ways to describe this Music Pack.

  • 14 New Full Length Songs are Included
  • All songs can have their Tempo changed making nearly unlimited variations!

Enough reading about it, the video contains (15 second) clips from each song in this pack.

Tracks

  • Aeon
  • Between Life and Death
  • Bone Breaker
  • Dark Rider
  • Deatholation
  • Dark Fire
  • Iron Knight
  • Lighting Power
  • Sky Titans
  • Apocalypse Age
  • Take Over
  • Kingdoms Alliance
  • Unknown Hero
  • Venom Surge

short_description: Many parties will encounter a brooding NPC who may take them on a bit of a high strung adventure. Be prepared for such an event with this full album release! Intense, Exciting and Dramatic are some great ways to describe this Music Pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista and Above
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 Ghz Dual Core or AMD Athlon 2.6 Ghz Dual Core
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 or AMD Phenom II x4
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 7870/R9 270 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti/760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Device
